title: When the devs write a pun into the patch notes

replies.body: I feel like they spend more time working on their puns than actually trying to balance the game

> [{quoted}](name=SofaKingBroken,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1eYevsrg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-11T13:57:45.123+0000)
>
> I feel like they spend more time working on their puns than actually trying to balance the game

You're aware that balance and writing the patch notes isn't handled by the same group of people right?

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1eYevsrg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-04-11T14:01:37.575+0000)
>
> You're aware that balance and writing the patch notes isn't handled by the same group of people right?

Nah, he’s the type of person to walk into a home depot and demand that they make him a pizza because they’re spending too much time selling tools.
Yes I am aware of the fact that the people who handle the balance part dont play the game.
I think their puns are pretty funny. But you know whats not? This post.

> [{quoted}](name=General Matty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1eYevsrg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-04-11T15:26:24.580+0000)
>
> I think their puns are pretty funny. But you know whats not? This post.

I disagree, I don't think they are funny at all. I enjoy that they are there and that creative thought was put into the jokes, it's just isn't funny to see myself get deleted by a master Yi with 3 autos when he was behind

Balance Team: We are buffing Mundo !

Me: Yeah, tanks are making a come back

Patch Notes:  More Damage! 

Me: This post
